thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Denise

author: Denise
title: Denise
text: It was really easy using FlightHub. Their prices were even lower than Expedia and easier to book the exact times that I wanted to fly. They even provide comparisons to other dates so you can choose the cheapest flights within a limited timeframe. The only issue is that the insurance goes on to the bill automatically if you don't uncheck the box, but this is changed fairly quickly by their customer service person if you don't want it. Overall would recommend.
